name: kubero
description: Kubero is a self hosted Heroku like platform for deploying applications to Kubernetes clusters. It provides a developer focused UI, git based deployments and environment management to simplify app hosting on K8s.
features: Kubernetes PaaS: Heroku-like platform for deploying apps to Kubernetes clusters. Simplify K8s complexity.
Git-Based Deployment: Push code to Git and automatically deploy to Kubernetes. Streamlined deployment workflow.
Environment Management: Separate dev, staging, and production environments. Manage app lifecycle stages.
Buildpack Support: Automatic detection and building with Cloud Native Buildpacks. Deploy without Dockerfiles.
Web UI: Developer-friendly interface for managing apps and deployments. Visual Kubernetes management.
Pipeline Automation: Automated build, test, and deployment pipelines. CI/CD built-in.
Environment Variables: Manage configuration and secrets per environment. Secure app configuration.
Scaling: Manual and automatic scaling of application instances. Handle varying load.
Logs & Monitoring: View application logs and metrics from dashboard. Debug and monitor apps.
Database Add-ons: Provision databases and services for applications. Simplify infrastructure setup.
Custom Domains: Configure custom domains with SSL certificates. Professional app URLs.
Rollback: Easy rollback to previous deployments when issues occur. Recover from bad deploys quickly.
